description:
This course examines the processes involved in property planning; setting business goals, evaluating the effects of change within a property & at a catchment & regional level, in order to implement changes that are ecologically sustainable. Offered alternate years: 2008, 2010 etc. 
NOTE: The Intensive offering may involve additional costs associated with its offering in a remote location. (Minimum enrolment required: 5 each for External & Internal mode, 8 for Intensive mode)
